alerts.name: Enhanced Alert/Warning Cards
alerts.description: A set of customizable alert cards for displaying information, success, warning, and error messages. Includes an icon with a subtle pulse effect and a close button for each alert.

alerts.name: CSS Toast Notifications
alerts.description: A clean and modern toast notification system built with pure CSS and JavaScript. Includes success, info, warning, and error notifications with progress bars, icons, and auto-dismiss functionality.

alerts.name: Notification System
alerts.description: A clean and modern notification system with success, info, and warning notifications. Includes progress bars, icons, and auto-dismiss functionality.

alerts.name: Material Notifications
alerts.description: A modern material design-inspired notification system with success, info, warning, and error notifications. Includes progress bars, icons, and action buttons.

alerts.name: Enhanced Alert System
alerts.description: A modern and visually appealing alert system with success, info, warning, and danger alerts. Includes progress bars, icons, and auto-dismiss functionality.

alerts.name: Modern Alert System
alerts.description: A modern and sleek alert system with success, info, warning, and error alerts. Includes progress bars, icons, and auto-dismiss functionality.

alerts.name: Notification Buttons with Dynamic Alerts
alerts.description: A set of buttons that trigger dynamic notifications (success, warning, error, info) with icons and close functionality. Notifications slide in from the right and auto-close after 5 seconds.

alerts.name: Working Alert System
alerts.description: A dynamic alert system that allows users to trigger success, warning, error, and info alerts. Alerts slide in from the right, include icons and messages, and auto-close after 5 seconds.

alerts.name: Dark Theme Alerts with Theme Toggle
alerts.description: A dark-themed alert system with a theme toggle button. Users can trigger success, warning, error, and info alerts. Alerts slide in from the right, include icons and messages, and auto-close after 5 seconds. Supports light and dark themes.

alerts.name: Minimal Alerts with Theme Toggle
alerts.description: A minimal and modern alert system with a theme toggle button. Users can trigger success, warning, error, and info alerts. Alerts slide down from the top, include icons and messages, and auto-close after 4 seconds. Supports light and dark themes.

alerts.name: Toast Notifications
alerts.description: A sleek toast notification system with success, warning, error, and info toasts. Toasts slide in from the right, include icons, titles, and messages, and auto-dismiss after 5 seconds. Supports swipe-to-dismiss on touch devices.

alerts.name: Smart Notifications with Priority Levels
alerts.description: A smart notification system with priority levels (critical, high, normal, low). Notifications appear in different positions based on priority, include icons, titles, and messages, and auto-dismiss after a specified duration. Supports expandable details and progress indicators.

alerts.name: Holo Notifications
alerts.description: A futuristic holographic notification system with cyberpunk aesthetics. Notifications include animated sound waves, glowing borders, and dynamic icons. Supports info, alert, success, and error notifications.

alerts.name: Modern Toast Notifications
alerts.description: A modern and sleek toast notification system with support for light and dark themes. Includes success, info, warning, and error notifications with progress bars and close functionality.

breadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs with Theme Toggle
breadcrumbs.description: A modern breadcrumb navigation system with a theme toggle button. Supports light and dark themes and is fully responsive.

breadcrumbs.name: Neon Breadcrumb Navigation
breadcrumbs.description: A futuristic neon-style breadcrumb navigation component with a theme toggle. The breadcrumb links glow with a neon effect and include smooth hover animations. The theme toggle supports dark and light modes with a glowing switch effect and particle animation.

breadcrumbs.name: Modern Horizontal Breadcrumb
breadcrumbs.description: A modern and responsive horizontal breadcrumb navigation component with a theme toggle. It supports light and dark themes, smooth scrolling, and interactive breadcrumb links.

breadcrumbs.name: Circular Stepped Breadcrumb
breadcrumbs.description: A circular stepped breadcrumb navigation system with a theme toggle button. It supports both light and dark themes and is fully responsive.

breadcrumbs.name: Responsive Horizontal Breadcrumb
breadcrumbs.description: A responsive horizontal breadcrumb navigation component with theme toggle. Supports smooth scrolling and animations. The component can switch between light and dark themes.

breadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs with Theme Toggle
breadcrumbs.description: A modern breadcrumb navigation system with a theme toggle button. Supports light and dark themes and is fully responsive.

breadcrumbs.name: Glassmorphism Breadcrumb
breadcrumbs.description: A modern glassmorphism-style breadcrumb navigation with icons, hover effects, and a theme toggle for light and dark modes.

breadcrumbs.name: Stylish Breadcrumb with Theme Toggle
breadcrumbs.description: A stylish breadcrumb navigation component with a theme toggle feature. The breadcrumb links are interactive, and the theme toggle allows switching between light and dark modes. The design is responsive and includes smooth transitions.

breadcrumbs.name: Modern Breadcrumb with Theme Toggle
breadcrumbs.description: A modern breadcrumb navigation component with a theme toggle feature. The breadcrumb links are interactive, and the theme toggle allows switching between light and dark modes. The design includes smooth transitions, a gradient overlay, and ripple effects on link clicks.

breadcrumbs.name: Floating Breadcrumb with Theme Toggle
breadcrumbs.description: A floating breadcrumb navigation component with a theme toggle feature. The breadcrumb links are interactive, and the theme toggle allows switching between light and dark modes. The design includes smooth transitions, hover effects, and a pulse animation for separators.

breadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs with Theme Toggle
breadcrumbs.description: A modern breadcrumb navigation system with a theme toggle button. Supports light and dark themes and is fully responsive.

breadcrumbs.name: Adaptive Breadcrumb with Theme Toggle
breadcrumbs.description: An adaptive breadcrumb navigation component with a theme toggle feature. The breadcrumb links are interactive, and the design includes a gradient overlay, hover effects, and a responsive layout that adjusts for mobile devices. The theme toggle allows switching between light and dark modes with a smooth animation.

breadcrumbs.name: Gradient abart Breadcrumb with Theme Toggle
breadcrumbs.description: A gradient-themed breadcrumb navigation component with a theme toggle feature. The breadcrumb links include a gradient underline effect on hover, and the current page is highlighted with a gradient text effect. The theme toggle allows switching between light and dark modes with a smooth sliding animation.
